name: poTem
description:
This is an archive of one of the first games I ever made in Unity.

poTem was an entry for the WSPTA 2019 Game Development Competition and won the "Best Team Game" and "Best Game Design" awards.

The game revolves around solving puzzles as Gary, the time traveling robot.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim, and Left Mouse Button to shoot

Space to go back in time

The Rude Goldbergs:

Engineer, Modeler, and Animator - William Erignac

Music and Sound Design - Alex Pujol

Sound Implementation - Rudy Banerjee

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

WSPTA 2019 Game Development Competition: https://www.wastatepta.org/2019-wspta-game-development-competition-results/

Download Gary for yourself: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/gary-the-time-traveling-robot-ecaee86ee50e412fb1...

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Bonus points for finding all the spelling errors.
